free.title: Free
free.description: Perfect for beginners exploring the crypto trading world

features.technical: View 3 latest technical/sentiment analyses and trading recommendations without history
features.marketStatus: Basic market status assessment from the manager at the beginning of the day

pro.title: Premium
pro.description: For active traders who need advanced tools and insights

features.advanced: Unlimited access to analysis history (trade suggestions, technical and sentiment analysis)
features.history: Unlimited time, personal chat support with junior and senior managers
features.pairs: View detailed content and source links to news
features.alerts: View detailed assessments and action plans from managers, updated multiple times daily
features.priority: Push notifications about potential opportunities and risks as soon as they're detected

cta.title: Start TraiOS today
cta.description: Empower your financial future with our guidance focused squarely on building substantial wealth. We employ proven methods aimed at maximizing returns while carefully managing risk, ensuring sustainable growth for years to come.

hero.title: AI-powered Trading Decisions
hero.description: Transform market data into intelligent strategic advantages and AI-driven decision insights. Harness this powerful data with accuracy and predictive insights, revealing profitable trading trends and opportunities.

confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errorChangingPassword: Error changing password. Please try again.
passwordSetSuccessfully: Your password has been set successfully
heroDescription: Transform market data into your strategic advantage; our AI engine decodes intricate patterns, quantifies potential risks with precision, and delivers predictive insights, enabling faster, smarter, and ultimately more profitable trading decisions.
aiDecisionMakingDesc: Experience a risk-based model, apply contextual market trends, metrics, technical fundamental, and expert insights making for a highly sophisticated AI.
aiBrokerAssistanceDesc: Engage in real-time, 24/7 conversations with our AI-driven tips broker. The Bot reads insights and enhance decision making.
aiLearningDesc: Leveraging Conversational AI-powered learning (CPA) and machine learning algorithms to continuously enhance decision making, adapting in real time to market shifts.
regulatoryComplianceDesc: Proactively aligning with financial authorities in the U.S., Japan, and Vietnam to ensure compliance and security.
strategicPartnershipsDesc: Collaborating with reputable financial institutions and exchanges to enhance trust, liquidity, and market access.
scalableInfrastructureDesc: A cloud-based architecture capable of serving millions of users globally—scaling effortlessly with minimal human cost.
